title: A sneak preview of your ranked games tomorrow.

replies.body: "lol report this fucking {{champion:69}} what kind of scrub doesn't buy boots 35 minutes into the game"
"idiot team doesnt enchant boots at full build omg these noobs"
RIP Boot Upgrades
This needs more upvotes

Don't you mean....

(some player): "IM PLAYING TALIYAH DON'T BAN, DON'T WORRY, I MAIN HER"

To be fair, alot of people on the PBE do figure out the pros and cons of a champion and master them sometimes. I did the samething with Jhin because I had so much time to play him on the PBE I got so used to the guy hes's become my go to ranged carry.
Same I like played him so much I forgot how to play other champions for a bit

When Aurelion Sol was released on the PBE I went to Youtube checking if someone did a video about him. What did I find instead? A video called "Aurelion Sol my new main"....how can a champion who was released an hour ago become your main? It doesn't make sense!

> [{quoted}](name=Kishiyami,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HB40870c,comment-id=00060001,timestamp=2016-05-04T01:10:40.459+0000)
>
> When Aurelion Sol was released on the PBE I went to Youtube checking if someone did a video about him. What did I find instead? A video called "Aurelion Sol my new main"....how can a champion who was released an hour ago become your main? It doesn't make sense!

You play him on the PBE.

You analyze each and every skill and figure out different build paths.

You figure out which skills work together and which don't.

You figure out which items work best together and which don't.

You discover stuff by accident. AND

You want to main them.

That is how someone mains something an hour after it comes out. -Sol main 2016

Eh...I think of a main as a champion someone declares as the champion they're most committed to learning and playing as their best champion. However new the champion is or how skilled they are with that champion doesn't mean anything until you have at least 60 or so games in my book.

If they have at least 60+ games (more for high skill floor champions like azir or lee sin), then you can bet I'm gonna be at least a little bit judgemental. >.>

I think a main is whoever you play the most, and it can change.

Through the end of season five I was a Bard/Lux main but now i've almost entirely stopped playing Lux and instead have been playing Morgana constantly.

Who isn't coming until like the patch after this patch or the following 2 patches after this patch....

If that was meant to be the joke I'm sorry
Yes, it was meant to be a joke.
dude shut up, i main every new champion!

{{champion:30}}: Shopkeeper? I think my {{item:3070}} is faulty... it's not replenishing my mana, it's just making my spells cost less mana...
**Shopkeeper**: You didn't read the patch notes, did you?
{{champion:30}}: what do you mean?
**Shopkeeper**: Riot changed it so it refunds 15% of your mana spent instead of giving you regen.
{{champion:30}}: WTF?! WHAT THE HELL AM I SUPPOSED TO DO IF I RUN OUT?!
**Shopkeeper**: buy more mana .__.
{{champion:30}}: ... I bet {{champion:161}}  isn't having to deal with this crap...
*meanwhile at the other Shop*
{{champion:161}}: ... sooo... to use {{item:3010}}, I have to take damage... for mana... then use a spell, USING said mana I just restored... so I can heal the damage?
**Shopkeeper**: yes, that's correct.
{{champion:161}}: ... You know that makes no sense, right?
**Shopkeeper**: Hey, I don't make these things, I just sell them

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Moon Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HB40870c,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2016-05-04T07:51:58.870+0000)
>
> I have to take damage... for mana... then use a spell, USING said mana I just restored... so I can heal the damage?

Vicious cycle of the Catalyst.
{{champion:12}} could probably milk this.

"First time Malz Jungle but I saw it done on the PBE, it's godly, Imma carry this game so hard"

*AN ALLY HAS BEEN SLAIN.*

An ally has been executed

FTFY
When they start with Machete, E and max Q...

Alteast she isn't getting gutted like Vlad.

Rioter1: Let's design a champion around the idea that he has to put out damage for his ultimate to be useful.

Rioter2: HEY, HOW ABOUT WE MAKE IT SO HIS ABILITIES TAKE FOREVER TO CHARGE UP THEIR DAMAGE!

Rioter1: http://blog.zacscy.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Genius.jpg

:/
You never know, maybe some people will figure out how to make vlad strong.
Literally everyone I saw on PBE said Vlad's damage was insane.
Will confirm, his E is so much more impactful now. His empowered Q hits so hard.
New Vlad is hella strong, Don't talk about things you do not know, every game on PBE there was a vlad, who absolutely raped ass.

Ironic you say that because I never saw a Vlad do well. Do you have any vids or anything to show is power because even on Youtube I've seen people perform poorly with him.

All he has is early game power but since his abilities are so odd to manage  late game he just falls into the bin despite his passive.
I'm no Cass player, but I thought she was pretty cool when I tried her on PBE; let me know what you think

Idk, i'm figuring I will try it before I pass any judgements on if it was good or bad, but the simple fact is that her playstyle is completely different now. 

I used to play her focusing almost entirely on building my stacks up in lane, and than afterwards I was either in the backline trying to pretend that I was an ADC, or hiding in a brush so that I can scream at someone who unwittingly walks by.

Now, (I think?) shes more DPS and less burst capable, but she does have giant zone control now which is super cool. Also at first I was worried about losing the mana refund but since mages build mana now I think it will be okay. Also early game I'll probably do more than w-e minion waves with q's to catch the enemy.

Idk ill see.

I thought she was more bursty if anything; again, I don't have a solid understanding of 6.8 Cass, plus I was testing vs. bots (on one hand it's more controlled, on the other bots are pretty weak and you outscale them since they don't itemize or CS), but once you get rolling, you can kill a squishy with a Q and 2-3 empowered Es. I liked the Lich Bane build on her since you have more downtime between your Es to weave in autos, so your DPS is really high, not to mention it gives you MS.
This new cass on URF will be... holy shit. The e will be on a .18 second cd
{{champion:45}} will have a higher ban rate than {{champion:245}} and {{champion:16}} combined!
Yeah, saw his new ult on PBE only because he aimed at someone else. If it's going for you, all you're going to see is 50 Shades of Grey as he penetrates your anus.
Noooo, mah main ;-;

Also
{{champion:82}} 100/0/0
GET ALL THE DRAGONS!!!!!!!!
hue
huehue
huehuehue
but rageblade gets the passive. this is so much worse, because now double hitter can actually have farm.
I thought you called him Double Hitler.
you thought one was bad, just wait for there to be two at once.
But since melee champs don't get double stacks anymore its much less likely to proc in champion encounters.

I can see XZ liking it.
But yeah it's bad for WW.
WW can't gank without his ult and the onlything to do instead is farm and he's not really working towards gaining stacks, as much as he is working towards rageblade, and it's just much better to have a dvourer champ that can gank instead of AFK farming, as it has more prescence and almost as equal income.
Farm junglers are still going to farm. They just have more incentive gank now, without being gated by a powerspike on an item.
Why would XZ or Jax not focus on ganking?
